metadata.title: CVE-2023-31211 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: Insufficient authentication flow in Checkmk before 2.2.0p18, 2.1.0p38 and2.0.0p39 allows attacker to use locked credentials

criterions.comment: check-mk: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
